title: Senate Armed Services Committee advances 2024 NDAA
summary: The Senate Armed Services Committee on June 23 advanced its version of the 2024 National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) by a vote of 24-1 after closed deliberations.

title: Defense Authorization, Appropriations Bills Ready for Floor Action
summary: The House and Senate Armed Services Committees completed their work on the FY2024 National Defense Authorization Act this week, with both committees approving their bills almost unanimously. The House Appropriations […]

title: SpaceX Starship to implement Hot Staging
summary: SpaceX implementing Hot Staging to Starship Super Heavy Interstage

title: SpaceX changing Starship stage separation ahead of next launch
summary: SpaceX is changing the approach for separating the two stages of its Starship vehicle to increase payload performance before its next test flight, Elon Musk said June 24.

title: Dream Chaser Continues Chasing its Path to the Pad
